io.micronaut.security.token.basicauth

Class BasicAuthTokenReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.security.token.reader.HttpHeaderTokenReader
      • io.micronaut.security.token.basicauth.BasicAuthTokenReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    io.micronaut.core.order.Ordered, TokenReader

    @Requires(property="micronaut.security.token.basic-auth.enabled",
          notEquals="false")
 @Singleton
public class BasicAuthTokenReader
extends HttpHeaderTokenReader
implements TokenReader
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Sergio del Amo
